summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1480, for the improvement of 8th Avenue Northeast from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, by laying water mains, sewers and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15943 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
